response.overview: While hiding from bullies in his school's attic, a young boy discovers the extraordinary land of Fantasia, through a magical book called The Neverending Story. The book tells the tale of Atreyu, a young warrior who, with the help of a luck dragon named Falkor, must save Fantasia from the destruction of The Nothing.
response.tagline: A boy who needs a friend finds a world that needs a hero in a land beyond imagination!
response.title: The NeverEnding Story

titles.title: ネバーエンディング・ストーリー

cast.name: Bernd Eichinger
cast.character: Man next to Man who drops Milk (uncredited)

results.name: Ways The NeverEnding Story Is Different From The Book
